mapper.sql: a.xh AS "xh", a.zd_xh AS "zdXh", a.store_name AS "storeName", a.drug_id AS "drugId", a.ybtybm AS "ybtybm", a.isjbyw AS "isjbyw", a.kss AS "kss", a.cmed_code AS "cmedCode", a.drug_detail_type AS "drugDetailType", a.dose_code AS "doseCode", a.drug_name AS "drugName", a.drug_spec AS "drugSpec", a.package_unit AS "packageUnit", a.package_qty AS "packageQty", a.sales_unit AS "salesUnit", a.sales_qty AS "salesQty", a.sales_relation AS "salesRelation", a.producer_name AS "producerName", a.cost_price AS "costPrice", a.sale_price AS "salePrice", a.cost_amt AS "costAmt", a.sale_amt AS "saleAmt", a.batch_no AS "batchNo", a.sdrugmanufacturers AS "sdrugmanufacturers", a.sdrughabitat AS "sdrughabitat", a.sratificationno AS "sratificationno", a.ddateproduce AS "ddateproduce", a.expiry AS "expiry", a.inventorystorage AS "inventorystorage", a.storagenumber AS "storagenumber", a.inventorynumber AS "inventorynumber", a.ypmrkl AS "ypmrkl", a.scrq AS "scrq"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO medsto_yppdd( xh, zd_xh, store_name, drug_id, ybtybm, isjbyw, kss, cmed_code, drug_detail_type, dose_code, drug_name, drug_spec, package_unit, package_qty, sales_unit, sales_qty, sales_relation, producer_name, cost_price, sale_price, cost_amt, sale_amt, batch_no, sdrugmanufacturers, sdrughabitat, sratificationno, ddateproduce, expiry, inventorystorage, storagenumber, inventorynumber, ypmrkl, scrq ) VALUES ( #{xh}, #{zdXh}, #{storeName}, #{drugId}, #{ybtybm}, #{isjbyw}, #{kss}, #{cmedCode}, #{drugDetailType}, #{doseCode}, #{drugName}, #{drugSpec}, #{packageUnit}, #{packageQty}, #{salesUnit}, #{salesQty}, #{salesRelation}, #{producerName}, #{costPrice}, #{salePrice}, #{costAmt}, #{saleAmt}, #{batchNo}, #{sdrugmanufacturers}, #{sdrughabitat}, #{sratificationno}, #{ddateproduce}, #{expiry}, #{inventorystorage}, #{storagenumber}, #{inventorynumber}, #{ypmrkl}, #{scrq} )
mapper.update: UPDATE medsto_yppdd SET xh = #{xh}, zd_xh = #{zdXh}, store_name = #{storeName}, drug_id = #{drugId}, ybtybm = #{ybtybm}, isjbyw = #{isjbyw}, kss = #{kss}, cmed_code = #{cmedCode}, drug_detail_type = #{drugDetailType}, dose_code = #{doseCode}, drug_name = #{drugName}, drug_spec = #{drugSpec}, package_unit = #{packageUnit}, package_qty = #{packageQty}, sales_unit = #{salesUnit}, sales_qty = #{salesQty}, sales_relation = #{salesRelation}, producer_name = #{producerName}, cost_price = #{costPrice}, sale_price = #{salePrice}, cost_amt = #{costAmt}, sale_amt = #{saleAmt}, batch_no = #{batchNo}, sdrugmanufacturers = #{sdrugmanufacturers}, sdrughabitat = #{sdrughabitat}, sratificationno = #{sratificationno}, ddateproduce = #{ddateproduce}, expiry = #{expiry}, inventorystorage = #{inventorystorage}, storagenumber = #{storagenumber}, inventorynumber = #{inventorynumber}, ypmrkl = #{ypmrkl}, scrq = #{scrq} WHERE id = #{id}
